titlepage.titleproper: A Guide to the Records of the Governor's Office, Executive Mansion, 1989-1994
titlepage.subtitle:
A Collection in
the Library of Virginia 35539, 35881

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Records of the Governor's Office, Executive Mansion, 1989-1994

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Virginia. Governor's Office, Records of the Executive Mansion, 1989-1994. Accession 35539, 35881, State government records collection, The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Va. 23219.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Transferred from Governor L. Douglas Wilder on 31 October 1996.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Records, 1989-1994, of the Executive Mansion Director during the administration of Governor L. Douglas Wilder. The collection is housed in 10 boxes and includes articles, correspondence, invitations, invoices, lists, memorandums, menus, photographs, and other documents. Collection documents functions held at the Executive Mansion during the Wilder administration; director correspondence regarding the operation of the Mansion; tours of the Mansion; Governor's thank yous for gifts received; records on renovation and refurbishment of the mansion; and related papers.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is arranged into the following series:

list.item: Series IV: Governor's Thank Yous for Gifts Received, 1990-1994

scopecontent.p: Events, 1990-1994, contains correspondence, invitations, lists, memorandums, menus, and other documents detailing the scheduling and planning of events held at the Executive Mansion during the Wilder administration, including breakfasts, lunches, dinners, receptions, ceremonies, meetings, and interviews.

scopecontent.p: Director's correspondence, April-December 1990, contains correspondence and memorandums to and from director Cathy Walker Green regarding the day-to-day operations and activities at the Executive Mansion.

Tours, 1991, contains correspondence requesting and confirming tours of the Executive Mansion for various groups, such as school groups and civic organizations. Also includes thank you letters for the tours.

did.unittitle: Series IV: Governor's Thanks Yous for Gifts Received, 1990-1994.

scopecontent.p: Governor's Thanks Yous for Gifts Received, 1990-1994, contains correspondence, lists, memorandums, and other documents, consisting of thank you replies for gifts received by Governor Wilder.

did.unittitle: Governor's thank yous--holiday thank yous, December 1991-January 1992

scopecontent.p: Executive Mansion, 1989-1994, contains budgets, correspondence, inventories, memorandums, and other papers concerning the renovation and refurbishment of the Mansion during the Wilder administration; operating budget for 1992; inventory of Wilder's personal property; and security, staffing, and tours.

did.unittitle: Executive Mansion renovations and alterations, February 1990-August 1991
Executive Mansion Refurbishing briefing of the Governor, 16 March 1990
Training for new Mansion telephone system, 7 March 1990

scopecontent.p: General Subjects, 1990-1992, contains governor's meal schedules, recipes, memorandums on a birthday party and on a bowling team, inventory of Pendleton Cottage located in Virginia Beach, Virginia, and implementation manual and training program manuel from Pennsylvania for the Americans With Disabilities Act.

did.unittitle: Americans with Disabilities Act: An Implementation Manual for Design Professionals--Pennsylvania
Training Program for Commonwealth Managers and Supervisors on Title I of the Americans with Disabilities Act--Pennsylvania
